Ok.content:
This is a less intense / disturbing summary of key events in "some human relationships are less universal than others" and "take this report back and bring her a better report" in the planecrash continuity, meant to be read immediately after the end of "mad investor chaos and the woman of asmodeus".

It is made entirely out of spoilers and softened summaries; people who would rather get the full experience should read the originals instead.
Ok.description: less disturbing summary of 'some human relationships' and 'take this report back'
Ok.subject: tldr some human relationships
